title: Hey Penne Lyrics Kattappava Kaanom
stanzas:
kadhal nenjil thaen ootrudhey
kaatril mella yaazh meethudhey

kannala nee kadhal pachakuththa
nenjellam panjaagi Â ponadhenna
kaatrodu kaatragum kaatraadipol
kadhal unnoduthaan

hey penne penne
unnai kanda pinney
neram nalla neram
endru thondruthey

oh minnum ponne
kannu kulla undhan
bimbam yengo yennai
kondu poguthey

adikiraa veyila pol
uthuthu pakkura
adikadi kulirapol vandhu
eerkura

kaadhil mella kaadhal solli
kaatril yettri yenna kooti pogura
nooru kaalal nenjam oda
kaatu theeyai yenna paththa vekkura

ma.. mazhaiyai pol
then pozhindhaaye
meen kannaala
oon kalandhaaye

hey penne penne
unnai kanda pinney
neram nalla neram
endru thondruthey

hey penne penne
unnai kanda pinney
neram nalla neram
endru thondruthey

oh minnum ponne
kannu kulla undhan
bimbam yengo yennai
kondu poguthey

adikiraa veyila pol
uthuthu pakkura
adikadi kulirapol vandhu
eerkura

seo.title: Hey Penne Lyrics Kattappava Kaanom
seo.description: Get the complete Hey Penne Lyrics Kattappava Kaanom from Kattappava Kaanom. Read the lyrics penned by Uma Devi and composed by Santhosh Dhayanidhi and sung by Aishwarya. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Uma Devi, Kattappava Kaanom, Santhosh Dhayanidhi, Aishwarya, Alisha Thomas, Sid Sriram, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
